meanings.definition: Not of or relating to industry.
meanings.sent1: The small village remained nonindustrial, with no factories or large businesses.
meanings.sent2: The farm was a nonindustrial property, focusing on sustainable agriculture.
meanings.sent3: The nonindustrial town had a peaceful atmosphere, free from the noise of machinery.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a nonindustrial landscape, filled with creativity instead of routine.
meanings.sent5: The nonindustrial setting of the countryside was a breath of fresh air compared to the city.

meanings.definition: Not involving or engaged in industrial activities.
meanings.sent1: The nonindustrial park was perfect for picnics and outdoor games.
meanings.sent2: She preferred nonindustrial hobbies like painting and hiking over factory work.
meanings.sent3: The nonindustrial cat seemed content to nap all day without a care in the world.
meanings.sent4: His nonindustrial approach to problem-solving involved creativity and innovation.
meanings.sent5: The nonindustrial lifestyle of the countryside was a welcome change from the hustle and bustle of the city.
